---
title: "Install Tinytex"
output: html_document
---

The tinytex R package cannot install TinyTex (the minimal TexLive distribution) under users who do not have administrative rights on their computer. Follow these steps to install TinyTex under your user account. 

```{r}
library(RCurl)

```



```{r}
tinytex_zip_url <- "https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/yihui/tinytex/artifacts/TinyTeX.zip"

temp_file <- tempfile()
download.file(tinytex_zip_url, temp_file)
```
